scripts.clean-all: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && yarn cache clean && cd ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/ && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && cd .. && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && yarn clean-ios && yarn clean-android && yarn start --reset-cache
scripts.clean-cache: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && yarn cache clean && cd ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/ && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && cd .. && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && yarn start --reset-cache
scripts.clean-ios: cd ios && xcodebuild clean && rm -rf Pods && pod install && cd ..
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && cd ios && rm -rf pod && pod install && cd ..
scripts.make-apk:dev:d: yarn clean-android && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleDevelopDebug && cd ..
scripts.make-apk:dev:r: yarn clean-android && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleDevelopRelease && cd ..
scripts.make-apk:stg:d: yarn clean-android && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleStageDebug && cd ..
scripts.make-apk:stg:r: yarn clean-android && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleStageRelease && cd ..
scripts.make-apk:prd:d: yarn clean-android && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleProductDebug && cd ..
scripts.make-apk:prd:r: yarn clean-android && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleProductRelease && cd ..
scripts.make-aab:dev:d: yarn clean-android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleDevelopDebug && cd ..
scripts.make-aab:dev:r: yarn clean-android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleDevelopRelease && cd ..
scripts.make-aab:stg:d: yarn clean-android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleStageDebug && cd ..
scripts.make-aab:stg:r: yarn clean-android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleStageRelease && cd ..
scripts.make-aab:prd:d: yarn clean-android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductDebug && cd ..
scripts.make-aab:prd:r: yarn clean-android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductRelease && cd ..
